title: Affimed Announces Acceptance of AFM24 Clinical Abstract at the 2024 Annual Meeting of the American Society of Clinical Oncology
summary: Affimed N.V. (Nasdaq: AFMD) announces the acceptance of the AFM24 clinical abstract at the 2024 ASCO Annual Meeting. The phase 2 study on AFM24 in combination with atezolizumab in patients with EGFR wild-type non-small cell lung cancer has been accepted for poster presentation. The abstract will be available on ASCO's website on May 23, 2024.

title: Alvotech Announces Topline Results from a Confirmatory Clinical Study for AVT05, a Proposed Biosimilar for Simponi® (golimumab)
summary: Alvotech has announced positive topline results from a confirmatory clinical study for AVT05, a proposed biosimilar to Simponi® (golimumab) for patients with rheumatoid arthritis. The study met its primary endpoint, demonstrating therapeutic equivalence between AVT05 and Simponi, with no clinically meaningful safety differences observed. Alvotech plans to file marketing applications for AVT05 in major global markets this year, showcasing the company's capabilities in biosimilar development. Worldwide revenues from sales of Simponi and Simponi Aria were approximately $3.2 billion in 2023.

title: Marqeta Partners with OakNorth to Offer Commercial Cards in the UK, Embracing Growing Small and Medium-Sized Business Demand for Better Banking Tools
summary: Marqeta partners with OakNorth to offer commercial cards in the UK, catering to the demand for better banking tools. OakNorth, a leading UK digital bank, collaborates with Marqeta to provide Business Banking customers with a commercial card, enabling more efficient financial management for small and medium-sized businesses. The partnership aims to bridge the SME funding gap in the UK and empower businesses to navigate economic uncertainties.

title: Calliditas Announces Positive NefIgArd Open Label Extension Results
summary: Calliditas Therapeutics AB announced positive results from the NefIgArd Open Label Extension study, showing consistent treatment response in terms of proteinuria reduction and eGFR stabilization at 9 months for all IgAN patients. The study followed the successful Phase 3 NefIgArd study, which led to FDA approval in December 2023, and the full data set was published in The Lancet. CEO Renée Aguiar-Lucander expressed excitement about the results and highlighted the upcoming presentation of data at the ERA EDTA symposium.

title: Danfoss Selects RISE with SAP and HPE GreenLake to Accelerate Sustainable Cloud Journey
summary: Danfoss partners with RISE with SAP and HPE GreenLake to accelerate its sustainable cloud journey, deploying SAP S/4HANA® Cloud in its data centers. With a focus on energy efficiency and data sovereignty, Danfoss modernizes its IT landscape while reducing energy consumption and carbon emissions through collaborations with HPE and SAP.

title: Power Nickel Extends Momentum - Closes Acquisition on 80% of Nisk
summary: Power Nickel Inc. has successfully acquired an additional 30% of the Nisk Project, bringing its ownership to 80%. The company has reported high-grade multi-elements assay results, showcasing impressive mineral discoveries. Power Nickel plans to continue exploration efforts and drilling at the Lion Discovery, with promising results and ongoing progress. The CEO expressed optimism about the project's potential and future production decisions, emphasizing the significant mineralization findings. The company's Winter 2024 drill program ended successfully, with notable intersections and positive assay results. Power Nickel remains committed to funding expenditures at Nisk until a Bankable Feasibility Study is presented, indicating a strong commitment to the project's development.

title: CSL Vifor and Travere Therapeutics Announce European Commission approves FILSPARI® (sparsentan) for the treatment of IgA Nephropathy
summary: CSL Vifor and Travere Therapeutics receive conditional marketing authorization from the European Commission for FILSPARI (sparsentan) for the treatment of IgA Nephropathy, marking a significant advancement in non-immunosuppressive therapy for this rare kidney disease.

title: Tower Semiconductor Announces First Quarter 2024 Financial Results and Conference Call
summary: Tower Semiconductor, a leading foundry of high-value analog semiconductor solutions, announced its first quarter 2024 financial results and upcoming conference call. The earnings release is scheduled for May 9, 2024, with a discussion on financial results and second quarter 2024 guidance. The conference call will be held on the same day at 10:00 a.m. Eastern Time and can be accessed via webcast or phone. Investors can find more information on Tower Semiconductor's Investor Relations section.

title: Futu Announces the Number of Its Clients in Malaysia Has Surpassed 100,000
summary: Futu Holdings , a tech-driven online brokerage and wealth management platform, announced that the number of its clients in Malaysia has exceeded 100,000. The company launched its brokerage business in Malaysia on February 26, 2024, and received the Capital Markets Services License on January 24, 2024.

title: Assa Abloy Quarterly Report Q1 2024
summary: Assa Abloy's Q1 2024 report shows a 9% increase in net sales to SEK 35,200 M, driven by strong execution despite a challenging market. Organic growth was -2% while acquired net growth was 11%. The company saw stable growth in Entrance Systems but declines in other regions. Three acquisitions contributed to the positive sales performance.

title: TotalEnergies and Vanguard Renewables, a Portfolio Company of BlackRock’s Diversified Infrastructure Business, Join Forces to Develop Renewable Natural Gas in the United States
summary: TotalEnergies and Vanguard Renewables, a Portfolio Company of BlackRock’s Diversified Infrastructure Business, have formed a joint venture to develop renewable natural gas projects in the United States. The agreement, signed in New York, aims to advance 10 RNG projects with a total annual capacity of 0.8 TWh over the next 12 months. The partnership will focus on farm-based organics-to-RNG production, with initial projects in Wisconsin and Virginia.

title: HUSQVARNA GROUP: INTERIM REPORT JANUARY - MARCH 2024
summary: Husqvarna Group's first quarter 2024 saw a 14% decrease in net sales, impacted by planned exits of low-margin petrol-powered business and a 11% decline in organic sales. The Gardena Division achieved 2% organic growth, while operating income decreased to SEK 1,930m. The acquisition of ETwater expanded the commercial irrigation offering in North America. Despite challenges, the Group remains focused on strategic growth in segments like robotic mowers and battery-powered products, emphasizing sustainability and innovation.

title: Guidewire Launches DEVSummit
summary: Guidewire (NYSE: GWRE) launched its first-ever DEVSummit to unite, educate, and energize the global Guidewire development community. The event features mainstage keynotes, deep-dive workshops, certification courses, and a virtual hackathon. Attendees will gain insights on development trends, Guidewire's growth plan, and the latest features across the Guidewire Cloud Platform.

title: Volvo Cars reports 8 per cent increase in Q1 2024 core operating profit to SEK 6.8 billion
summary: Volvo Cars reports an 8% increase in Q1 2024 core operating profit to SEK 6.8 billion, with revenue at SEK 93.9 billion. The company achieved a 12% rise in retail sales and set new sales records in various markets. The EV sales share increased to 21%, with impressive gross margins on EVs. Volvo Cars expects strong demand and aims for at least 15% sales growth in 2024, focusing on profitable growth and cost efficiency.

title: Clarivate joins United Nations SDG Publishers Compact
summary: Clarivate Plc (NYSE:CLVT) joins the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) Publishers Compact, committing to sustainable practices and championing the SDGs. The company aims to use its data and insights to address global challenges and promote sustainability across various sectors. Initiatives include supporting good health and well-being, quality education, industry innovation, and responsible consumption and production.

title: Angle PLC Announces New Commercial Agreement with AstraZeneca
summary: ANGLE plc has signed a commercial agreement with AstraZeneca to develop a methodology using its DNA damage response assay for detecting micronuclei in circulating tumor cells. The agreement is worth £150,000 for a 6-month development phase. The DDR therapeutics market is projected to reach $10.4 billion by 2031 with a CAGR of 6.5%, driven by the need for novel targeted medicines for cancer treatment.

title: Pharming Group to report first quarter 2024 financial results on May 8
summary: Pharming Group N.V. announces it will release its first quarter 2024 financial results on May 8, 2024. The company will present the preliminary unaudited report for the period ending March 31. Analysts and investors can join a conference call on the same day at 13:30 CEST/07:30 am EDT. To participate, registration is required. A live webcast will also be available for viewing.

title: Heineken Holding N.V. reports on 2024 first-quarter trading
summary: Heineken Holding N.V. reports on its first-quarter trading in 2024, highlighting revenue growth of 7.2%, organic growth of 9.4%, and beer volume growth of 4.7%. Premium beer volume increased by 7.3%, with Heineken® volume growing by 12.9%. Despite challenges in the economic environment, Heineken expects operating profit to grow organically by a low- to high-single-digit. Currency translation impact is estimated at €640 million negative for the full year 2024.

title: Aker BP: First quarter 2024 results
summary: Aker BP reported robust operational and financial performance in the first quarter of 2024, with increased oil and gas production, low costs, and emissions, along with all field development projects progressing as scheduled. The company achieved an EBITDA of USD 2.8 billion, operating profit of USD 2.2 billion, net profit of USD 531 million, and free cash flow of USD 339 million. CEO Karl Johnny Hersvik highlighted the successful completion of the Hanz project and the ongoing progress of the Tyrving development.

title: Skanska signs contract regarding manufacturing facility in the Northeast USA for USD 94M, about SEK 970M
summary: Skanska has signed a USD 94M construction contract with a consumer goods manufacturer for a manufacturing facility in the Northeast USA, translating to about SEK 970M, showcasing their continued growth and expansion in the region.

title: Ecora Resources PLC Announces Q1 2024 Trading Update
summary: Ecora Resources PLC reported a strong Q1 2024 trading update with a 117% increase in portfolio contribution compared to Q4 2023, driven by operations at Kestrel. The company expects continued growth in production volumes in 2024 and 2025, with net debt at $87 million providing flexibility for further growth. Key highlights include a $19.5 million portfolio contribution, cobalt deliveries from Voisey's Bay, and upcoming updates on the Santo Domingo Feasibility Study and the West Musgrave project.

title: Senzime Wins Another Major US Veterans Affairs Contract; Expands Reach of TetraGraph System
summary: Senzime, a leader in perioperative patient monitoring solutions, secures a significant contract with the US Department of Veterans Affairs to provide TetraGraph Systems. The contract with the North Florida/South Georgia Veterans Health System marks a milestone in expanding Senzime's reach in the US healthcare market. The TetraGraph system aids anesthesiologists in administering drugs accurately, enhancing patient safety post-surgery. CEO Philip Siberg expresses pride in the partnership, highlighting Senzime's dedication to advancing perioperative care for US veterans.

title: Evotec Presents Fiscal Year 2023 Results and Announces Priority Reset to Focus on Profitable Growth
summary: Evotec reported financial results for fiscal year 2023, meeting updated guidance. The company announced a priority reset to focus on profitable growth, with adjustments expected to drive annualized EBITDA improvement over €40 million. Despite challenges, group revenues increased by 4% to €781.4 million, with Just - Evotec Biologics revenue up 111%. Adjusted Group EBITDA was €66.4 million. Strategic partnerships with Bristol Myers Squibb and Janssen, new collaborations, CEO transition, and approval of targets by SBTi were highlighted. Evotec plans to update mid-term forecast with H1 2024 results, expecting double-digit revenue growth and reduction in unpartnered R&D expenses. The company aims for sustainable and profitable growth, with a priority reset to streamline operations and enhance profitability.

title: PetroTal Announces Corporate Updates
summary: PetroTal Corp. announces leadership team updates with the appointment of Mr. Camilo McAllister as Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, bringing over 25 years of experience in the international energy sector. Additionally, Mr. Emilio T. Acin Daneri joins as Vice President, Business Development, with over 30 years of experience in global oil companies. The Company expresses gratitude to Mr. Douglas Urch for his contributions as he retires from his role as the Chief Financial Officer.

title: Kuros Reports Corporate Highlights as of Q1 2024 Including Increase in Direct MagnetOsTM Sales
summary: Kuros Biosciences reported a significant increase in Direct MagnetOs sales by 155% to CHF 13.9 million in Q1 2024 compared to Q1 2023. The total sales for Kuros Medical Devices segment also surged to CHF 13.9 million. The company achieved a positive EBITDA of CHF 3.9 million. MagnetOs Putty received FDA 510(k) clearance for interbody use, and an independent clinical study showed an 86% fusion rate in lumbar fusion procedures. Joe Ross joined as Senior VP Marketing and Business Development. The company displayed strong financial performance and regulatory achievements in Q1 2024.

title: Axis Technologies Group and Carbonis Forge Ahead with New Digital Carbon Credit Technology
summary: Axis Technologies Group (OTCMARKETS: AXTG) collaborates with Carbonis to launch a new blockchain platform for carbon credits, minting 50 million CO2e tokens. The DAO governance model ensures transparency and community engagement. This milestone reinforces the commitment to environmental sustainability.

title: Acer Among Top 5% Scoring Companies in S&P Global Corporate Sustainability Assessment
summary: Acer Inc. has been recognized among the top 5% of companies in the S&P Global Sustainability Yearbook 2024 for its sustainable practices. This marks the fourth consecutive year Acer has been listed in the yearbook, showcasing its commitment to corporate sustainability and social responsibility. Acer's achievements include maximum scores in the Social component and validation by the Science Based Targets initiative for its GHG emissions reduction goals.

title: Suzano Ventures invests up to US$5 million into Bioform Technologies to further develop bio-based plastic alternatives
summary: Suzano Ventures invests up to US$5 million into Bioform Technologies to further develop bio-based plastic alternatives. Suzano Ventures, the venture capital arm of the world’s largest market pulp producer, Suzano, invests in Canadian startup Bioform Technologies to enhance sustainable plastic alternatives. Bioform's innovative materials offer bio-based solutions to single-use plastics, aiming to scale cost-effectively using pulp and paper industry processes.

title: InterContinental Hotels Group PLC Announces Transaction in Own Shares - April 24
summary: InterContinental Hotels Group PLC announces the purchase of 19,905 of its own ordinary shares on the London Stock Exchange through Goldman Sachs International. The company intends to cancel the purchased shares, leaving 163,042,508 ordinary shares in issue. The transaction was made in accordance with shareholder authorization from the 2023 Annual General Meeting.

title: [Ad hoc announcement pursuant to Art. 53 LR] Roche sales increase by 2% (CER) in first quarter with both divisions growing in high single digit ex COVID-19
summary: Roche reports a 2% increase in sales in the first quarter, with both pharmaceuticals and diagnostics divisions experiencing high single-digit growth excluding COVID-19 products. The company saw a 7% growth in pharmaceuticals driven by sales of medicines for severe diseases, while the diagnostics division grew by 8% due to demand for immunodiagnostic products.

title: Republic of Congo: TotalEnergies Increases Its Interest in Giant Field Moho and Divests Two Mature Assets
summary: TotalEnergies increases its interest in the Moho field and divests two mature assets in the Republic of Congo. The company signs an agreement with Trident Energy to acquire an additional 10% interest in Moho while selling its interests in Nkossa and Nsoko II. TotalEnergies aims to focus on low cost, low emission assets and leverage its offshore expertise in the region.

title: Heineken N.V. reports on 2024 first-quarter trading
summary: Heineken N.V. reported a strong first-quarter trading update for 2024 with revenue of €8,184 million, up 7.2%. Key highlights include organic growth in net revenue, beer volume, premium beer volume, and Heineken® brand volume. The company maintained its outlook for the full year with an expected low- to high-single-digit growth in operating profit. The CEO highlighted positive growth across regions, premiumization trends, digital platforms, and sustainability efforts.

title: Vivoryon Therapeutics N.V. Reports Full Year 2023 Financial Results and Provides Varoglutamstat and Strategic Updates
summary: Vivoryon Therapeutics N.V. reported its full-year 2023 financial results, highlighting the ongoing analysis of the VIVIAD Phase 2b study and the disappointing outcome regarding varoglutamstat's effect on cognition in early Alzheimer's disease. The company observed a statistically significant improvement in kidney function with varoglutamstat, leading to a shift in strategic focus towards inflammatory and fibrotic disorders. The VIVA-MIND Phase 2 study will be discontinued early to facilitate accelerated data analysis. The company aims to reduce cash utilization and prioritize resources for exploring varoglutamstat in kidney disease, analyzing VIVIAD and VIVA-MIND data, advancing select pipeline programs, and continuing business development. Financially, the company expects its cash runway to extend into Q2 2025 without additional financing, contingent on current plans and the discontinuation of VIVA-MIND.

title: Pharming to be honored as Industry Innovator at National  Organization for Rare Disorders (NORD®) 2024 Rare Impact Awards
summary: Pharming Group N.V. is honored as an Industry Innovator at the NORD® 2024 Rare Impact Awards for commercializing Joenja® (leniolisib), the first-in-class medication for APDS. The FDA-approved treatment is the only one available for adult and pediatric patients with APDS, a rare immune system disorder. Pharming has successfully delivered the first shipments to patients in the U.S., marking a significant milestone in the treatment of rare diseases.

title: TraWell Co Conducts Sustainability Assessment With Cerved Rating Agency
summary: TraWell Co, a global protection services company, undergoes an ESG sustainability assessment by Cerved Rating Agency, achieving a score of 51/100. The assessment reveals areas for improvement and strengths, leading to strategic development actions. CEO Rudolph Gentile emphasizes the importance of ESG sustainability for competitive advantage and stakeholder value. The company is dedicated to ongoing improvement and transparency in all ESG aspects.

title: Jaxon Announces Resignation of CFO
summary: Jaxon Mining Inc. announces the resignation of Brian Crawford as Chief Financial Officer and Corporate Secretary, effective April 12, 2024. A replacement will be announced soon.

title: Blue Owl Capital Hires Australia Future Fund's Deputy Chief Investment Officer Alicia Gregory
summary: Blue Owl Capital Inc. hires Alicia Gregory, a seasoned investment professional with over 25 years of experience, as a Managing Director in Sydney. Alicia joins from the Future Fund, Australia's sovereign wealth fund, where she served as Deputy Chief Investment Officer. Blue Owl sees this hire as a strategic move to enhance their institutional team and strengthen partnerships in the Australian market, given Alicia's expertise and relationships within the industry.

title: CGG: Availability of the preparatory documents for the Combined General Meeting
summary: CGG announces the availability of preparatory documents for its Combined General Meeting scheduled for May 15, 2024. Shareholders can access the agenda, draft resolutions, and meeting details on the company's website.

title: Woodside Energy Group Ltd Annual General Meeting Address by Chair Richard Goyder and CEO Meg O';Neill
summary: Woodside Energy Group  holds its Annual General Meeting with addresses from Chair Richard Goyder and CEO Meg O'Neill. The company's leadership discusses key strategies, financial performance, and future outlook.

title: Transaction in Own Shares
summary: Endeavour Mining plc announces the purchase of 29,500 of its ordinary shares from Stifel Nicolaus Europe  The company bought its shares at prices ranging from 1,646.00 GBp to 1,675.00 GBp per share. Following the share repurchase, Endeavour will have no treasury shares and 244,971,685 ordinary shares in circulation. These transactions are part of the company's buy-back program initiated in 2023.

title: Norsk Hydro: Resilient in weak markets, positioned for growth
summary: Norsk Hydro reported adjusted EBITDA of NOK 5,411 million for Q1 2024, down from NOK 7,525 million last year. Despite challenges in aluminium sales prices and recycling margins, the company remains focused on growth and sustainability. Key highlights include increased renewable energy usage, improved profitability through natural gas usage, and ongoing decarbonization efforts. While the weak construction market impacts some segments, positive signs in aluminium prices and premiums are emerging. Hydro is well-positioned to benefit from improving demand for aluminium products.

title: Solventum Announces First Quarter 2024 Earnings Release Date and Upcoming Investor Events
summary: Solventum (SOLV) announced the release date for its first quarter 2024 financial results, which will differ from 3M's Health Care business presentation. The company also disclosed its participation in upcoming investor conferences.

title: Weatherford Announces $130 Million Credit Facility Increase to $680 Million and Notice to Redeem All of Its 6.50% Senior Notes Due 2028
summary: Weatherford International plc (NASDAQ: WFRD) has increased its Credit Facility by $130 million to $680 million, with additional lenders. The Company also plans to redeem all of its 6.50% Senior Notes due 2028, totaling $81,502,600. The CEO highlighted the progress in fortifying the capital structure, reducing debt by $1 billion in less than three years.

title: Ellington Credit Adopts Tax Asset Preservation Plan Designed to Protect Shareholder Value by Preserving the Availability of Its Net Operating Losses While Operating as a C-Corp
summary: Ellington Credit adopts Tax Asset Preservation Plan to safeguard shareholder value by protecting net operating losses while operating as a C-Corp. The plan aims to prevent significant ownership changes that could limit the company's ability to utilize its NOLs effectively.

title: Weatherford Announces First Quarter 2024 Results and Raises Full Year Margin Guidance
summary: Weatherford International plc (NASDAQ: WFRD) announced its first quarter 2024 results, with revenue up 15% year-over-year to $1,358 million. Operating income increased by 26%, and net income rose by 56%. Adjusted EBITDA reached $336 million, the highest in over 15 years. The company also expanded its Credit Facility to $680 million. Weatherford's full-year margin guidance was raised to 25% for 2024.

title: 10X Capital Venture Acquisition Corp. III Receives NYSE Notice Regarding Late Form 10-K Filing
summary: 10X Capital Venture Acquisition Corp. III (VCXB) received a notice from NYSE American regarding the late filing of its Annual Report on Form 10-K for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2023. The company's independent registered public accounting firm needed more time to review its financial statements. 10X III has a six-month Cure Period to file the report and regain compliance with NYSE American's listing standards.

title: IDEX Reports First Quarter Results and Confirms Full Year Guidance
summary: IDEX  (NYSE: IEX) reported first-quarter results with sales of $801 million, down 5% overall and 6% organically, surpassing EPS expectations. The company projects 0-2% organic sales growth for the full year. Despite challenges in certain segments, IDEX remains committed to driving growth and creating long-term value.

title: USCB Financial Holdings, Inc. Declares Quarterly Cash Dividend on Common Stock
summary: USCB Financial Holdings, Inc. declares a quarterly cash dividend of $0.05 per share of Class A common stock, payable on June 5, 2024. The dividend is subject to quarterly review and approval by the Board of Directors.

title: Shoals Technologies Group, Inc. Announces First Quarter 2024 Earnings Release Date and Conference Call
summary: Shoals Technologies Group, Inc. announced the release date for its first quarter 2024 earnings and conference call. The results will be disclosed on May 7, 2024, followed by a conference call. Interested parties can access the webcast or join the call through provided numbers. A replay will be available for a  time post the call.

title: Travel + Leisure Co. and Allegiant Announce Multi-Year Marketing Agreement
summary: Travel + Leisure Co. (TNL) and Allegiant (ALGT) have announced a multi-year marketing agreement to enhance customer engagement. Allegiant's leisure-focused model and Travel + Leisure Co.'s vacation ownership resorts will offer unique travel packages to their respective customer bases, boosting growth and providing affordable family vacations.

title: Veralto Reports First Quarter 2024 Results
summary: Veralto, a global leader in water and product quality solutions, reported a 1.8% increase in sales to $1.246 billion in the first quarter of 2024. Operating profit margin was 23.5%, with net earnings of $184 million. The company expects low-single-digit core sales growth for the second quarter and full year 2024, with adjusted earnings per share in the range of $3.25 to $3.34.

title: Amalgamated Financial Corp. Announces a 50% Quarterly Dividend Increase
summary: Amalgamated Financial Corp. announced a 50% increase in its quarterly dividend to $0.15 per common share, payable on May 8, 2024. The Board of Directors authorized this increase, reflecting a positive financial outlook for the company.

title: Steel Dynamics Reports First Quarter 2024 Results
summary: Steel Dynamics, Inc. (STLD) reported strong first quarter 2024 results with steel shipments of 3.3 million tons, net sales of $4.7 billion, operating income of $751 million, and net income of $584 million. The company's liquidity stands at $3.1 billion with a cash flow from operations of $355 million. Despite some challenges in steel order volatility, the company's performance was solid, driven by strong demand in automotive, non-residential construction, energy, and industrial sectors.

title: CNH announces signing of a €3.25 billion committed revolving credit facility
summary: CNH announces signing of a €3.25 billion committed revolving credit facility on April 19, 2024. The facility, entered with 18 banks, has a 5-year tenor with two extension options and replaces a previous €4 billion facility. It aligns with reduced funding needs post demerger of Iveco Group, showcasing strong bank support for the Company.

title: Evolus to Report First Quarter Financial Results on May 7, 2024
summary: Evolus, Inc. (NASDAQ: EOLS) will report its first quarter 2024 financial results on May 7, 2024. The company will host a conference call and webcast to discuss the results. Investors can participate in the call and access the webcast through the Evolus website. A question-and-answer session will follow management's remarks.

title: PTC Therapeutics Reports Inducement Grants Under Nasdaq Listing Rule 5635(c)(4)
summary: PTC Therapeutics, Inc. announced the approval of non-statutory stock options and restricted stock units to six new employees as part of their employment compensation. The awards, made under the Nasdaq inducement grant exception, include 8,090 shares of common stock and 8,290 RSUs. The stock options have an exercise price of $25.32 per share and a 10-year term, vesting over four years. The RSUs also vest over four years, with 25% vesting annually, subject to continued service with the company.

title: Trustmark Corporation Announces First Quarter 2024 Financial Results
summary: Trustmark  (NASDAQ: TRMK) reported strong financial results for the first quarter of 2024, with net income of $41.5 million, diluted earnings per share of $0.68, and a return on average tangible equity of 12.98%. The company saw solid loan growth, stable credit quality, and growth in fee income, while managing expenses effectively. Trustmark declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.23 per share. Loans held for investment increased 0.8%, revenue totaled $188.2 million, and noninterest income grew by 11.1%. Noninterest expense decreased by 3.9%. Trustmark maintained a strong capital position with CET1 ratio of 10.12% and total risk-based capital ratio of 12.42%. The company's loan portfolio remains diversified, and deposits decreased by 1.5%. Net charge-offs totaled $4.1 million, and provision for credit losses was $7.7 million. Net interest income decreased by 2.8%, while noninterest income grew by 11.1%. Trustmark remains focused on customer relationships, expense management, and long-term value creation for shareholders.

title: FSI ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2024 REVENUE
summary: Flexible Solutions International, Inc. (FSI) announces first quarter 2024 revenue results, with a slight decrease of approximately 6% compared to the same period in 2023. The company also declares a ten cent special dividend to be paid to shareholders in May 2024. Sales in Q1 were lower than the previous year but showed improvement compared to the previous quarter and the overall year of 2023. The company remains optimistic about future growth and continues to focus on both company growth and shareholder dividends.

title: Ranger Energy Services, Inc. Announces Date for First Quarter 2024 Earnings Conference Call
summary: Ranger Energy Services, Inc. (NYSE:RNGR) has announced the date for its first quarter 2024 earnings conference call. The Company will release its financial and operating results on Tuesday, May 7, 2024, before the market opens. The earnings conference call will be hosted by the Company's management at 9:00 a.m. Eastern time. Interested parties can join the call via phone or the Company's website, with a replay available afterward on the website.

title: The Vita Coco Company Announces the Formation of The Vita Coco Community Foundation
summary: The Vita Coco Company, Inc. (NASDAQ: COCO) has announced the formation of The Vita Coco Community Foundation, a nonprofit focused on empowering communities globally. The Foundation aims to build a resilient society for future generations, with initial funding from Vita Coco. Led by John Tran, the Foundation will focus on education, entrepreneurship, food, fuel, spaces, and places. This initiative reflects Vita Coco's commitment to social impact and sustainability, following its transition to a public benefit  and B Corp Certification.

title: FIRST UNITED CORPORATION ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2024 FINANCIAL RESULTS
summary: First United  reported its financial results for the first quarter of 2024, showcasing a consolidated net income of $3.7 million, or $0.56 per diluted share. The company experienced stable net income due to factors like loan growth slowdown and branch consolidation costs. While total assets saw a 0.4% increase, cash balances surged by $37.2 million, and gross loans increased by $5.7 million. The net interest margin was 3.12%, down from the previous year. Non-interest income remained stable, and non-interest expenses increased slightly. The 's net income saw a decrease year over year, influenced by a decline in net interest income and an increase in provision for credit losses. Despite challenges, the company's wealth management income grew, and operating expenses were managed effectively.

title: EQT Reports First Quarter 2024 Results
summary: EQT  (NYSE: EQT) reported strong financial and operational results for the first quarter of 2024. Highlights include net cash provided by operating activities of $1,156 million, total sales volume of 534 Bcfe, and exiting the quarter with $650 million in cash. The company also announced transformative acquisitions and agreements to strengthen its position in the natural gas market.

title: Empire State Realty Trust Publishes 2023 Sustainability Report with Major Achievements, Key Goals, and Transparent Metrics
summary: Empire State Realty Trust (ESRT) published its 2023 Sustainability Report showcasing significant achievements in environmental sustainability, energy reduction, and social governance. The report highlights ESRT's carbon neutrality, emissions reduction, and industry-leading rankings in sustainability metrics.

title: HCI Group Announces Five-Year Employment Agreement with Chief Executive Officer
summary: HCI Group, Inc. announces a new five-year Executive Employment Agreement with Chairman and CEO Paresh Patel, securing his leadership for the future. The agreement includes a long-term equity incentive with a vesting threshold of $200 per share, highlighting Patel's commitment to the company's goals and objectives. Patel's proven success has driven HCI Group to over $1 billion in annual premium, showing best-in-class performance in the industry.

title: Millicom announces the re-issuance of its AGM and EGM Convening Notice
summary: Millicom announces the re-issuance of its AGM and EGM Convening Notice, with a rectified note to the AGM agenda item 20 (Share Repurchase Plan). The meetings are scheduled for May 23, 2024. All other items remain unchanged. Updated AGM voting materials are available on the company's website.

title: Oregon Pacific Bancorp Announces First Quarter 2024 Earnings Results
summary: Oregon Pacific Bancorp (ORPB) reported strong financial results for the first quarter of 2024, with a net income of $1.6 million, quarterly deposit growth of $35 million, and quarterly loan growth of $14.3 million. The bank's cost of funds stood at 1.20%, and the net interest margin was 3.59%. Despite a decrease in net income compared to the previous quarter, the bank remains optimistic about its growth prospects for 2024.

title: Coeur Publishes 2023 ESG Report
summary: Coeur Mining, Inc. (NYSE: CDE) has published its 2023 ESG Report, emphasizing its commitment to environmental, social, and governance practices. The report highlights Coeur's focus on health and safety, transparent tailings management, biodiversity conservation, and climate resilience.
